<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

<a name="module_RTKRecording"></a>

The RTKRecording module represents the state of the current recording, and allows
to start/stop recordings and check if there's a recording in progress.


* [RTKRecording](#module_RTKRecording)
    * [.telemetry](#module_RTKRecording+telemetry)
    * [.start()](#module_RTKRecording+start)
    * [.stop()](#module_RTKRecording+stop)
    * [.pause()](#module_RTKRecording+pause)
    * [.resume()](#module_RTKRecording+resume)

<a name="module_RTKRecording+telemetry"></a>

### meeting.recording.telemetry
**Kind**: instance property of [<code>RTKRecording</code>](#module_RTKRecording)  
<a name="module_RTKRecording+start"></a>

### meeting.recording.start()
Starts recording the meeting.

**Kind**: instance method of [<code>RTKRecording</code>](#module_RTKRecording)  
<a name="module_RTKRecording+stop"></a>

### meeting.recording.stop()
Stops all recording currently in 'RECORDING' state

**Kind**: instance method of [<code>RTKRecording</code>](#module_RTKRecording)  
<a name="module_RTKRecording+pause"></a>

### meeting.recording.pause()
Pauses all recording currently in 'RECORDING' state

**Kind**: instance method of [<code>RTKRecording</code>](#module_RTKRecording)  
<a name="module_RTKRecording+resume"></a>

### meeting.recording.resume()
Resumes all recording currently in 'PAUSED' state

**Kind**: instance method of [<code>RTKRecording</code>](#module_RTKRecording)
